column5: Located in Galveston's Exclusive (Pirates Beach Community) with Pirates Quiet Family Beaches. Enjoy the Cool Downstairs Tiki Bar and Beautiful Gulf View. 15% HOTEL TAX is included in all nightly, weekly pricing and cleaning fee as required by TX & Galveston Law. All reservations require a signed 3 page contract and $300 refundable damage deposit. No guests under 25 years old unless accompanied by Parents.
column8: Beautiful Gulf View- Pirates Beach- "Just Coastin"
